description: This table contains information on Employer Group Health Plans (EGHPs) the patient lacks, that the Medicare Secondary Payor Questionnaire (MSPQ) indicates could be billed prior to Medicare.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: LACKS_TYPE_B4_MED_C_NAME
columns.description:
Used to help reorder coverages for a visit based on the Medicare Secondary Payor determination. This lists all of the types that the MSPQ indicates could be billed prior to Medicare but that the MSPQ indicates that the patient lacks.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Worker's Compensation


Liability


Non-Liability


Veterans Affairs


Black Lung


Research or Public Health Service


EGHP for Age Entitlement


EGHP for Disability Entitlement


Any EGHP
